H0.text: Ovaries are the structures in angiosperms where seeds form.

H1.text: Stamen is the location in angiosperms where seeds are formed.

H2.text: Testes are where angiosperms form seeds.

H3.text: Cones are where angiosperms form seeds.

A4.text: the ovules inside the ovary become the seeds of that fruit

A5.text: Double fertilization of the central cell in the ovule produces the nutritious endosperm tissue that surrounds the developing zygote within the seed
